title: Pre-Release Question
body:
Ok, i just had a question because i have Signed up to Alpha testing like about months ago when it just came out and it's still pending, So i wanted to ask if this means my request got denied or just hasn't been looked at yet...
Please answer if possible.

replies.body:
>So i wanted to ask if this means my request got denied or just hasn't been looked at yet

From what i have gathered from responses from the community in general, is that it possibly means you don't meet the criteria they want of players using the LCU.

Or it could possibly just be how they order requests in some fashion that order's them in a weird way (because i put mine when it was announced and got into it immediately, and it sounds like the closer to the start of a new wave you put your application in, the more likely you get into the LCU)
Oh ok Thanks for the respond
